base

Class BuildingObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.BuildingObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boundary, Decoration, Door, Elevator, ElevatorButton, Light, LightSwitch, Person

    public abstract class BuildingObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass on which all objects in the building are based on. Includes universal attributes applicable to any object.
    Author:
    Logan Moore

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[] animationStep
      Array of animation counts to be used by the individual object's paint function to keep track of the current frame.
      protected Building building 
      boolean drawBounds 
      protected int height
      Pixel dimensions of the object
      protected boolean interactive
      Whether or not the given object is interactive.
      protected boolean inUse
      Whether or not the given object is being used by something else.

      Speed and direction of the current object in pixels per tick.

      Speed and direction of the current object in pixels per tick.
      protected boolean visible
      Visibility of the given object (whether or not it is to be drawn).
      protected int width
      Pixel dimensions of the object

      Pixel coordinates of the object.

      Pixel coordinates of the object.
